name: Out For Delivery (itch)
description:
Basic idea of the game is that you own a store and instead of delivering customer's package on a vehicle, you shoot it from a cannon (because why not).

How to play?

Use to move the cannon, use to shoot the package and use to reset the game.

Development Process

Check out this twitter thread to get a basic understanding of development process.
